content: PBH SD Z M1 Self-drilling drywall screws Collated drywall screw (zinc-plated) for the SD-M 1 or SD-M 2 screw magazine – for fastening drywall boards to metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for use with SD-M 1 (max. length 1-1/4”) and SD-M 2 (max. length 2”) magazines and all Hilti drywall screwdrivers High fastening frequency – get more done in less time Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality All Hilti drywall drill-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Collated screws for high-speed drywall installation with the SD-M 1 and SD-M 2 screw magazines Applications Fastening drywall boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) Fastening hard boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Bugle head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Screw head type | Bugle head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | Yes, compatible with SD-M 1 screw magazine, Yes, compatible with SD-M 2 screw magazine | Product Class | Premium | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2070964 - Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/8 PBH SD Z M1 - Package Size 10000 pc - 3511853 - Coll. screw pkg 1-1/8 PBH SD Z M1 1/2 pall - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: -
